body.name: Guiheng Wireless Bluetooth Mouse,LED Dual Mode Rechargeable Silent Slim Laptop Mouse,Portable(BT5.2+USB Receiver) Dual Mode Computer Mice,for Laptop,Desktop Computer,ipad Tablet,Phone,TV (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: Dual Mode Wireless Bluetooth Mouse: 7 different color changes randomly while in use, offering soothing lighting, creating cool and fancy atmosphere for work and play.

This Wireless Bluetooth Mouse is Suitable For With Laptops/PC/Notebook/Tablet/Macbook/ipad/iPhone. It is Compatible With Android/Chromebook/Windows/Vista/Linux/Notebook/Mac OS and Other Devices. Suitable for Homes、Offices、Travel and More.
Wireless Computer Mouse Advanced Optical Tracking Technology with Quick Click and Precise Responsiveness Control, Can Meet Your Demand of Daily Office Work inGames and Personal Preference,;

The mouse will be in sleep mode in 5 mins of inactivity. You can choose use the 2.4G wireless mouse when the mouse botton switch is on the 2.4G mode,or connect your laptop's Bluetooth to use the Bluetooth mouse, easy to switch,

it can be easily put into your laptop bag and ultra-space saving.Slim and lightweight,durable ergonomic mouse is perfect for travel.The USB receiver is stored inside the back of the mouse.No need for a driver,Plug and Play!Automatic sleep mode and wake-up mode are installed to save energy.
body.description: Colorful LED rechargeable dual-mode Bluetooth mouse (Bluetooth 5.2+USB 2.4G) Note: Cannot be set to a specific color. One mouse, multiple devices Just press the mode switch button at the bottom of the mouse to control the device you want. Wide Device Compatibility Windows 8, Windows 10 or later, Android 5.0 or later, Mac OS X10.10 or later, iPad OS 13 or later, Chrome OSTM.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 138 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: How good can a mouse be? It works fine and is rechargeable. The on/off switch is hard to access.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I will give 4 stars ... for now until I actually start using it. It feels really smooth. I will update my review with the range after I have gotten a chance to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bargain of a Bargain-Basement Mouse
reviews.reviewText: Expect me no features and I'll tell you no lies. What you see in the pictures is what you get: a low-profile mouse that oozes GamerCool with RGB.Pros: It's dirt cheap. It's a dual mode (dongle+BT) mouse that costs less than most BT-only mice. It's rechargeable, but it hasn't converted to USB-C yet.Cons: Even though it has RGB, it is in no way a gaming mouse. The switches are mushy and soft, with barely any tactile feedback. The rubber on the mouse wheel is the sort that just **promises** to get all sticky and gross in a few years. It's low-profile, so it's best for young, healthy hands that can bear a little punishment/poor ergo.Nons: Neither pro nor con. The RGB is not controllable. It's on, all the time. It "breathes" and fades into different colors. It's not very bright, so it's easily ignored. Given the low power draw that is signature of LED lighting, I highly doubt it noticeably affects battery life.Summary: Go ahead and buy it. It's dirt cheap, and talks dongle+BT. Even if you hate it, what did it cost you, a vente at Morebucks?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great to use
reviews.reviewText: Love the feel of it while using. Wish the lights could be shut off. The charge didn't hold as long as I hoped. Otherwise I loved it. I did end up returning it due to charge only holding a few weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is seriously so quite sometime I don’t think I’m using it sometimes! The only con is the lights will change colors often and I wish there was an option to be able to use the mouse without the lights. I think the price is good for this kind of mouse. The make of it is a bit cheap but still is functional, battery life is really good. I used it for 4 days without having the charge it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mouse. It works great!
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality mouse. I use it for work, so I can't speak to its use for gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's okay, but no great
reviews.reviewText: The mouse does exactly what it is supposed to do so I don't want to complain. I believe this is more about personal preference. I don't like how you can't turn off the LED lights. I won't want rainbow lights flashing the entire time I'm on my laptop so that's a bit annoying. Also, the mouse is VERY slim, even more than I expected, so it isn't great if you have big hands or long fingers. If those two thing's weren't an issue, it would be perfect, but I would keep those facts in mind before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed for school
